Method of operation

　The following describes how to operate KAG.

Note
　This is generally written. Some functions may not be used depending on the game, etc., so I wonder if you can copy and paste this as it is and write it in the manual of the game etc. (sweat)


Basic operation

"Left click" or "Rotate wheel forward" or "Return key" or "Space key"
Actions such as reading or deciding an option, pressing a button, checking a check box, etc.
"Right click" or "ESC key"
Display message history or call right-click subroutine
"↑" "↓" or "←" "→" or "TAB" "SHIFT + TAB"
Move between choices, buttons, single line edits and checkboxes
"Rotate wheel backward" or "R key" or "SHIFT + ↑"
View message history
"F key"
Go to next choice / unread
"A key"
Read automatically
"B key"
Go back
"S key"
Sandwich a bookmark (in free-save mode)
"L key"
Follow the bookmark (in free save mode)

Operations while displaying message history

"Return key" or "Space key" or "ESC key"
Close message history
"Wheel rotation" or "↑" "↓" or "←" "→"
scroll

Dialog asking "Yes" or "No"

"click"
Select "Yes" or "No"
"←" "→"
Button selection
"Return key" or "Space key"
Press the selected button
